WINNER
Lost toddler A little boy went missing last week in Dora Alabama and was found by his neighbors threelegged dog not too long afterward PERIOD Who would have known that a threelegged dog could serve any kind of purpose

LOSER
Crazy chimps A pair of chimpanzees recently escaped from a zoo in Caliente California and attacked several zoo employees PERIOD One of the chimps was shot to death PERIOD Hollywood producers are now looking into the incident for use in the next Planet of the Apes film PERIOD
